Module main
Package com.vtuberrush.src.ui

Class ActionBar

java.lang.Object
com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Bar
com.vtuberrush.src.ui.ActionBar
public class ActionBar extends Bar
An action bar is a subclass of a bar used for selecting and placing down units in the game's playing field.
An action bar contains a collection of Unit Buttons which can be selected and placed down when clicking on the playing field.
Version:
0.0.1-alpha.1
Author:
Gio Carlo Ciudadano

  • Constructor Details

    • ActionBar

      public ActionBar​(int x, int y, int width, int height, Playing playing)
      Creates a new bar in defined location, and initializes all unit icons and unit sprites.
      Parameters:
      x - - The horizontal position of the bar from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - The vertical position of the bar from the top of the window in pixels.
      width - - The horizontal size of the bar in pixels.
      height - - The vertical size of the bar in pixels.
      playing - - Defines the specific instance of the scene where the action bar is initialized.

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(Graphics graphics)
      Renders all unit buttons, the currently selected and displayed units on the playing field, the statistics of the currently selected unit, and information regarding the game being paused.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.

    • drawButtonsFeedback

      public void drawButtonsFeedback​(Graphics graphics, Button button)
      Dynamically updates the color of the unit buttons in the action bar when it is being hovered or pressed.
      Parameters:
      graphics - - Responsible for drawing objects to the screen.
      button - - Contains information on what button is being updated.

    • addGold

      public void addGold​(int amount)
      Adds gold equal to the passed amount. Called by the tick method as passive income or by the EnemyManager when an enemy is killed.
      Parameters:
      amount - - Amount of gold being added. Dependent on the enemy type being killed.

    • subtractGold

      public void subtractGold​(int amount)
      Subtracts gold equal to the passed amount. Called when placing down a unit or when upgrading a unit in field.
      Parameters:
      amount - - Amount of gold being subtracted. Dependent on the upgrade or unit cost.

    • subtractLives

      public void subtractLives​(int amount)
      Subtracts player lies equal to the passed amount. Called when an enemy reaches the end flag of a level. Sets to a game end condition when player lives have all run out.
      Parameters:
      amount - - Amount of lives being subtracted. Higher-level enemies subtract more lives.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Unselects the currently selected and displayed unit and resets the current lives and gold of the user.

    • isPurchasable

      public boolean isPurchasable​(Unit unit)
      Returns true if there is sufficient gold to be subtracted from the user when the passed unit is placed on the field.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The selected unit being placed.

    • mouseClicked

      public void mouseClicked​(int x, int y)
      Traverses the list of buttons and checks if the position being clicked is within bounds of a button, selecting and displaying that unit if it is a unit button and running the associated method if it is a regular button.
      Parameters:
      x - - The horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - The vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mouseMoved

      public void mouseMoved​(int x, int y)
      Traverses the list of buttons and checks if the position of a mouse is within bounds of a button, dynamically updating the color of the unit button when hovered.
      If the mouse is not hovered, the hovered condition is set to false by default.
      Parameters:
      x - - The horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - The vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mousePressed

      public void mousePressed​(int x, int y)
      Traverses the list of buttons and checks if the position being clicked is within bounds of a button, dynamically updating the border color of the unit button when pressed.
      Parameters:
      x - - The horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - The vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • mouseReleased

      public void mouseReleased​(int x, int y)
      Dynamically resets all buttons after a button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      x - - The horizontal position of the mouse from the left of the window in pixels.
      y - - The vertical position of the mouse from the top of the window in pixels.

    • setDisplayedUnit

      public void setDisplayedUnit​(Unit unit)
      Sets the displayed unit to the passed unit.
      Called when clicking on a unit in the playing field or when clicking a unit button.
      Parameters:
      unit - - The unit being displayed.

    • getDisplayedUnit

      public Unit getDisplayedUnit()
      Returns the currently displayed unit.
      Returns:
      displayedUnit

    • getGold

      public int getGold()
      Returns the amount of gold the player currently has.
      Called when updating gold information and making purchases.
      Returns:
      gold

    • getLives

      public int getLives()
      Returns the amount of lives the player currently has.
      Called when subtracting lives and checking or a game end condition.
      Returns:
      lives
